Miami_Beach.Watson Island:
Watson Island is a neighborhood and man-made island in Biscayne Bay, in Miami, Florida, United States. Immediately east of the CBD and Omni neighborhoods of Greater Downtown Miami, it is connected to the mainland and South Beach, Miami by the MacArthur Causeway.


== History ==
The island was deeded to the city in 1919 with the restriction that it only be used for public or municipal purposes.
